sense.def:
Kadar človek
crawls
, se pomika naprej po rokah in kolenih.

seg.quote: Her baby is crawling about now.

sense.def:
Kadar žuželka ali vozilo
crawls
, se počasi premika.

seg.quote: A spider was crawling up my leg.

sense.def:
Če neki kraj
is crawling with people or things
, je tam polno ljudi ali predmetov.

seg.quote: The forecourt was crawling with security men.
Let's see who comes crawling to whom.

sense.def:
The crawl
je plavalni slog, pri katerem plavamo s trebuhom navzdol in zamahujemo čez glavo najprej z eno, nato z drugo roko.
